issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I was able to send a create-lb request that added listeners at the same time but the listeners were never added to the ELB:

Create request:
{code}
T 10.0.1.133:57268 -> 10.0.1.91:8773 [AP]
  POST /services/LoadBalancing HTTP/1.1..Host: 10.0.1.91:8773..User-Agent: EucaLobo/4.2.1..Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/
  *;q=0.8..Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5..Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate..Connection: close..Content-Length: 361..Content-Type: application/x-www-form-ur
  lencoded; charset=utf-8..Pragma: no-cache..Cache-Control: no-cache....AWSAccessKeyId=XNKO4SHYC0XH1OKWDKEVC&Action=CreateLoadBalancer&AvailabilityZones.me
  mber.1=one&Listeners.member.InstancePort=80&Listeners.member.LoadBalancerPort=80&Listeners.member.Protocol=HTTP&LoadBalancerName=asdfdasf&SignatureMethod
  =HmacSHA1&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-05-21T05%3A52%3A32Z&Version=2012-06-01&Signature=qsdiQMLcbFL%2BClehV4cdKk6YCOg%3D

T 10.0.1.91:8773 -> 10.0.1.133:57268 [AP]
  HTTP/1.1 200 OK..Content-Length: 327..Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8....<CreateLoadBalancerResponse xmlns="http://elasticloadbalancing.amaz
  onaws.com/doc/2012-06-01/"><CreateLoadBalancerResult><DNSName>asdfdasf-229524229045.lb.euca-qa.com</DNSName></CreateLoadBalancerResult><ResponseMetadata>
  <RequestId>27d8b992-be8a-44fc-9163-6477846010a0</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></CreateLoadBalancerResponse>
{code}


Describe:
{code}
T 10.0.1.63:44537 -> 10.0.1.91:8773 [AP]
  GET /services/LoadBalancing/?AWSAccessKeyId=VMILBK658NVWRDKHJCEJR&Action=DescribeLoadBalancersByServo&InstanceId=i-E362445E&SecurityToken=ZXVjYQABUQHlHUI
  Y3%2BtwL9q8yo3ueQ37jgoHqCYc3iow4n6xjUo62eG5ljtoK1dyFlnepu4ivJQDwhzW4Z62xy7SFuTcXY%2BB2eKTQmHJHyf%2By7PdPCL%2FwB4O0QwVyJzk0qGgF7APHIkjXG4mU6mf3VP%2FAR85%2
  Fpq8FD7Ic0BvXoYhL3vpKO6b1UXqMrfjhYaFaS44LNhkR%2B%2FsoRN6Xg%2BaOBIzSSpoMrwBKMKbCF13CJzQL0PvI1m84hY8iQTUMA%3D%3D&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersio
  n=2&Timestamp=2013-05-21T05%3A57%3A05Z&Version=2012-06-01&Signature=P5fmqat63F45Ypf46hFbyku%2FGG5mbqwcr25Zoz3DTDw%3D HTTP/1.1..Host: 10.0.1.91:8773..Acce
  pt-Encoding: identity..Content-Length: 0..User-Agent: Boto/2.8.0 (linux2)....

T 10.0.1.91:8773 -> 10.0.1.63:44537 [AP]
  HTTP/1.1 200 OK..Content-Length: 764..Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8....<DescribeLoadBalancersByServoResponse xmlns="http://elasticloadbala
  ncing.amazonaws.com/doc/2012-06-01/"><DescribeLoadBalancersResult><LoadBalancerDescriptions><member><LoadBalancerName>asdfdasf</LoadBalancerName><DNSName
  >asdfdasf-229524229045.lb.euca-qa.com</DNSName><AvailabilityZones><member>one</member></AvailabilityZones><HealthCheck><Target>HTTP:80/index.html</Target
  ><Interval>30</Interval><Timeout>5</Timeout><UnhealthyThreshold>2</UnhealthyThreshold><HealthyThreshold>10</HealthyThreshold></HealthCheck><CreatedTime>2
  013-05-21T05:52:32.857Z</CreatedTime></member></LoadBalancerDescriptions></DescribeLoadBalancersResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>1211f310-089f-4d08-af
  23-491ad0526298</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></DescribeLoadBalancersByServoResponse>
{code}
fields.summary: Unable to add listener at ELB create time

comments.body:
This happened via EucaLobo.   the listener is required.   [~tony] will check if euca2ools works.

Parameters are off on EucaLobo compared to euca2ools according to [~sjones]

Euca2ools output looks like the listener is added.

{code}
[root@h-13 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z PARTI00 -l "protocol=HTTP, lb-port=80, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" lbz2 --debug
2013-05-21 11:01:54,543 DEBUG   CreateLoadBalancer parsed arguments: {'SecurityGroups.member': None, 'url': None, 'Listeners.member': [{'InstancePort': 80, 'LoadBalancerPort': 80, 'Protocol': 'HTTP', 'InstanceProtocol': 'HTTP'}], 'userregion': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'LoadBalancerName': 'lbz2', 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'Scheme': None, 'Subnets.member': None, 'AvailabilityZones.member': ['PARTI00']}

[~viglesias] I guess then the bug is with eucalobo. do you want to take it?
